thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 15 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Third Point Takes Share Stake in Black Knight, PBF Energy

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Third Point Takes Share Stake in Black Knight, PBF Energy
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - THIRD POINT LLC :
* THIRD POINT LLC DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN ALTABA INC -SEC FILING
* THIRD POINT LLC CUTS STAKE IN ALIBABA GROUP HOLDING LTD BY 33 PCT TO 4 MLN SPONSORED AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES -SEC FILING
* THIRD POINT LLC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 1.3 MILLION SHARES IN PBF ENERGY INC -SEC FILING
* THIRD POINT LLC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 1.3 MLN SHARES IN BLACK KNIGHT INC
* CHANGES IN THIRD POINT LLC'S HOLDINGS ARE AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED DEC 31, 2017 Source For the quarter ended Mar 31, 2018: bit.ly/2IjmYBd Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: bit.ly/2BtZhBz
